13. Variables

13.1. Overview

The categories of predefined variables are:

  1. Conversion variables
  2. Document variables
  3. File variables
  4. Miscellaneous variables.

Date-time variables are in units of seconds since January 1, 1970. To format a time, use the FormatTime subroutine.

Further details on each group of variables are provided below.

Conversion Variables

Document Variables

File Information Variables

Miscellaneous Variables
